thread.section_title: Viking Bags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Viking Bags | vikingbags.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Viking is a great company and a great saddle bag
however they shipped me brand new bags that were $$ expensive, with a faulty latch and waited for the "customer/me" to contact them before they were going to fix the problem.
They are sending new and better latches for me to "install myself" instead of fixing the "known" problems before shipping the saddlebags to the customer.
Now I have to figure out how to get the latches on properly and for price of the saddlebag, they should have been perfect upon arrival.
